original_text: And when Jehoshaphat and his people came to take away the spoil of them, they found among them in abundance both riches with the dead bodies, and precious jewels, which they stripped off for themselves, more than they could carry away: and they were three days in gathering of the spoil, it was so much.
korean_text: 여호사밧과 그의 백성이 가서 적군의 물건을 탈취할새 본즉 그 가운데에 재물과 의복과 보물이 많이 있으므로 각기 탈취하는데 그 물건이 너무 많아 능히 가져갈 수 없을 만큼 많으므로 사흘 동안에 거두어들이고

sentences.original_text: And when Jehoshaphat and his people came
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여호사밧과 그의 백성이 왔을 때

sentences.original_text: to take away the spoil of them
they found among them in abundance both riches
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들 가운데 풍부한 재물을 발견했고

sentences.original_text: which they stripped off for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 그들이 자신을 위해 벗겨낸 것들이었습니다

sentences.original_text: more than they could carry away
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 가져갈 수 있는 것보다 더 많았습니다

sentences.original_text: and they were three days in gathering of the spoil
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 전리품을 모으는 데 사흘을 보냈습니다
